leader.aboutStartup:
Vision Caravan is a virtual tourism startup that enables people to experience temples, forts, and heritage locations virtually, with a strong focus on realistic immersion. Our platform allows users to feel as  they are physically present inside the destination.
Using advanced virtual reality (VR), 3D environments, and real-world integration, Vision Caravan places the user inside the scene, not just as a viewer but as an active participant in the virtual space.

leader.instituteOrOrg: AGNISTOKA DIGITAL UNIVERSE TECH PVT LTD
leader.aboutStartup:
We are an Ai first software company, Currently we building AyuProfit. AyuProfit is an AI-powered health and fitness SaaS platform, and AyuBand is an AI-enabled wearable device. Together, they form an integrated smart health ecosystem focused on improving fitness, wellness, and performance through data-driven intelligence.

AyuBand captures real-time biometric and activity data such as heart rate, activity levels, recovery, and wellness indicators. AyuProfit uses Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to analyze this data and deliver personalized insights, performance recommendations, and predictive health analytics for individuals, gyms, trainers, and fitness businesses.

Our solution helps fitness centers and users make smarter decisions, improve outcomes, automate operations, and scale digitally. The platform is designed to be scalable, affordable, and impactful, with strong potential for real-world deployment across India.

Aapka Sathi is a people-first support platform dedicated to making everyday life easier through reliable assistance, smart solutions, and community-driven services. Built with the vision of “support when you need it the most”, Aapka Sathi acts as a trusted companion for individuals, families, and businesses.
We focus on connecting people with the right help at the right time, ensuring transparency, affordability, and quality in every interaction. Whether it’s guidance, service coordination, or problem-solving support, Aapka Sathi stands by its users as a dependable partner.

Our Mission:
To empower communities by providing accessible, dependable, and technology-enabled support services that simplify lives.

Our Vision:
To become India’s most trusted support ecosystem, where help is always just one step away.
Help starts hire interns efficiently

Purpose: Making drought data simple, fast, and actionable for better agricultural decisions.

Description: A smart drought monitoring system for Madhya Pradesh that tracks rainfall, temperature, and crop health across 55 districts in real-time. Using government weather data and satellite images, it calculates a simple Drought Score (0-100) for each district and sends early warnings when drought conditions develop. Instead of waiting weeks for field officers to verify drought, district officials, farmers, and insurance companies get instant, scientific drought status updates through an online dashboard. The platform helps save crops through early action, speeds up insurance claims from  days to 2 hours, and prevents losses by predicting drought risk before months in advance. Built using open-source technology and free government data by automation, making climate information accessible to everyone who needs it.
Exam Travels is a dedicated exam commute service designed to help aspirants travel safely, comfortably, and stress-free to their examination centre.

Kraft AI is an AI-powered content and growth platform designed to help students, startups, MSMEs, and individual innovators build visibility and scale their ideas faster. The platform enables users to research winning content ideas, generate scripts in their brand voice, automate content workflows, and analyze performance using AI.

For Madhya Pradesh’s growing startup and student ecosystem, Kraft AI reduces the barrier to digital growth by eliminating the need for large marketing teams or advanced technical skills. Using competitor analysis, custom AI models, and no-code automation, the platform cuts content creation time by over 70%.

Kraft AI supports use cases like student projects, early-stage startups, local businesses, and ODOP brands by helping them communicate their value clearly across platforms such as Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn. The vision is to make content creation system-driven, affordable, and scalable for anyone building in Madhya Pradesh.

BharatAI is an AI-powered travel companion designed to streamline tourism in India. It addresses unorganized planning by offering personalized itineraries, real-time crowd insights, and budget-aligned "Dream Trip" tools. Featuring a multilingual assistant, landmark recognition, and collaborative planning, it ensures a safer, culturally enriched, and more effortless travel experience.

JalRakshak is an intelligent, data-driven water management system designed to monitor, analyze, and predict water availability in different regions. The platform uses real-time and historical data such as rainfall patterns, groundwater levels, and population usage to identify potential water scarcity and provide early warnings.
The system helps individuals, communities, and authorities make informed decisions regarding water conservation by offering visual dashboards, predictive analytics, and actionable recommendations. JalRakshak aims to promote sustainable water usage, reduce wastage, and support effective planning for future water needs.
By combining technology with environmental responsibility, JalRakshak contributes to building a smarter, more water-secure future for India.

leader.aboutStartup: Bhushuraksha AI is a secure, scalable, and legally compliant AI-based land monitoring system aligned with the Smart Cities Mission and Digital India initiatives. The platform integrates satellite imagery from Maxar and NISAR with AI-driven land-use change detection to enable continuous monitoring of public and private land. Automated cross-verification with BhuNaksha/Bhulekh and municipal GIS databases ensures accuracy and minimizes false positives. A centralized GIS dashboard provides real-time alerts and inter-departmental coordination, while a citizen mobile application enables transparent, geo-tagged grievance reporting. The solution significantly reduces manual inspections, accelerates enforcement, lowers operational costs, and strengthens planned, lawful urban development—beginning with Indore and extendable to other smart cities nationwide.

Starial is a quick-commerce education platform built to solve urgent student needs. It delivers books, stationery, uniforms, and printed documents within 30 minutes through a hyperlocal network of verified vendors. At its core is Starial’s AI-powered ICCS (Intelligent Central Catalog System), which automates vendor onboarding, product cataloging, inventory sync, and smart order routing. By combining speed, accuracy, and intelligence, Starial removes friction for students and parents while helping local sellers go digital and scale efficiently.

Synergy Top is an AI-driven education technology company redefining how teaching and learning are experienced through Deep AI and the Epistemic Teaching and Learning Framework. Founded by distinguished alumni of IIT Bombay and IIM Mumbai, the company merges artificial intelligence with cognitive science to enable transformative learning experiences.
Synergy Top pioneers Adaptive and Personalized Learning & Performance Management, delivering real-time, tailored pathways that deepen conceptual understanding and promote measurable academic growth.
Key learning features include:
Non Linear Concept Builder
Result Maps to Knowledge Maps

Its ecosystem unifies students, teachers, parents, and administrators under one intelligent platform—combining AI-powered learning tools, no-code institutional management, and insight-rich analytics.

By integrating learning science, data precision, and adaptive intelligence, Synergy Top empowers learners and educators to achieve sustained academic excellence through personalized, evidence-based education.

Bazarse is India’s offline market app — a platform dedicated for the offline market in which we connect brands, offline stores, and customers at the right time and at the right place. On this platform, you can get all the best deals and offerings of the offline market , where users can shop directly in-store  with the power of artificial intelligence

MP Kisan Setu is a strategic innovation designed to function as a Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI) for the agricultural sector. The platform acts as a bridge between high-end technological advancements and the local farming community, transforming complex tools into accessible public utilities.

Core Innovation:
The startup integrates three critical technology layers into a unified ecosystem:

Satellite Intelligence: Provides real-time crop health monitoring and vegetation analysis directly to the farmer's device.

Precision Robotics: Establishes a seamless booking system for drone-based services, facilitating optimized nutrient and pesticide application.

Government Integration: Syncs with state land records and family identification systems to verify beneficiaries and ensure services reach the rightful landholders.

Mission:
The primary goal is to shift agricultural technology from a high-cost commercial service to a sustainable government-led utility. By focusing on a "nominal service fee" model, the startup ensures that the most marginal farmers can leverage the same precision data used by large-scale enterprises.

Impact:
Through this "Setu" (Bridge), the project enhances overall farm productivity, improves soil health through data-backed decisions, and streamlines the delivery of state subsidies, creating a transparent and technologically empowered rural economy.

Frayit is AI-based safety and security layer for online games. A lot of real harm happens inside games today such as  child grooming, sexual abuse in chat, cheating, bots, account takeovers, and payment fraud. Most studios only catch these after damage is done. Frayit plugs into a game’s backend and helps spot risky behaviour early across chat, gameplay, and transactions so that the studios can protect younger players, keep the game fair, and reduce losses without hurting the player experience. We’re early and working with studios to make sure what we’re building actually fits real-world gaming environments.

Yuoom is a travel and hospitality technology startup focused on solving pricing and availability challenges in hotel bookings, especially in spiritual and high-demand destinations across India. The idea was born from real travel experiences where negotiating hotel rates, managing budgets, and comparing multiple platforms was time-consuming and inefficient.

Yuoom introduces an AI-based bid-driven booking model, allowing travelers to place their budget upfront while hotels can accept or counter offers based on real-time availability. This creates transparency, saves time, and ensures fair pricing for both travelers and hotel partners.

Currently, Yuoom is generating revenue through curated tour packages while building a strong supply network of hotels, homestays, and hostels. Incubated at the Smart City Ujjain Incubation Center, Yuoom aims to scale into a smart, event-ready OTA platform designed for large spiritual gatherings and everyday travel alike.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Oriental institute of science and technology
leader.aboutStartup: Cerebrogrammers is an enterprise-grade Agentic AI platform for automotive predictive maintenance that transforms reactive service models into proactive autonomous systems. Our startup approach addresses a critical pain point in India's automotive sector where 68% of vehicle breakdowns occur without warning costing the industry 8.5 crores annually per 10,000 vehicles. We leverage multi-agent orchestration using CrewAI framework where a Master Agent coordinates six specialized Worker Agents each with distinct roles goals and behavioral backstories. The Data Analysis Agent continuously ingests real-time telematics data from both ICE and EV vehicles monitoring parameters like engine temperature oil pressure battery state of health and brake wear against established thresholds. Upon anomaly detection the Diagnosis Agent employs predictive modeling using historical failure patterns and current sensor deviations to calculate failure probabilities time-to-failure estimates and repair cost projections with over 90% accuracy. The Customer Engagement Agent utilizes large language models specifically GPT-4 with temperature tuning for natural conversation generation to create personalized voice-based outreach scripts that employ empathetic communication and objection handling techniques achieving 75% booking conversion rates. The Scheduling Agent implements constraint satisfaction algorithms to optimize appointment allocation across service center capacity customer availability and parts inventory while the Feedback Agent conducts post-service sentiment analysis to generate CSAT scores. Our Manufacturing Insights Agent performs Root Cause Analysis and Corrective Preventive Action by aggregating failure patterns across vehicle fleets identifying recurring defects and generating actionable recommendations for production teams thereby closing the loop between field data and manufacturing quality improvement. We implement Zero Trust security architecture through User and Entity Behavior Analytics where a Guardian AI establishes behavioral baselines for each agent monitoring API call volumes data access patterns and temporal activity to detect anomalies in under 2 seconds with autonomous threat response including agent quarantine and access revocation. Our technical stack includes LangChain for LLM orchestration OpenAI API for natural language processing ElevenLabs for custom voice cloning React with Tailwind CSS for responsive frontend Node.js or Python Flask for RESTful API backend and real-time WebSocket connections for live dashboard updates. The system processes multi-modal data including structured sensor telemetry unstructured maintenance logs and conversational customer responses while maintaining sub-24-hour response times from prediction to customer contact. Our business model targets automotive OEMs and large fleet operators with SaaS pricing based on vehicle count offering 800% ROI through 65% reduction in unexpected breakdowns 35% decrease in warranty claims and 40% lower maintenance costs by shifting from emergency repairs averaging 12,000 rupees to preventive service at 4,800 rupees. The platform demonstrates horizontal scalability having been architected to handle concurrent monitoring of 50,000 plus vehicles with distributed agent processing and demonstrates vertical integration by connecting vehicle telematics through AI-driven service coordination to manufacturing quality feedback creating a complete closed-loop ecosystem. Our go-to-market strategy focuses on pilot deployments with tier-one OEMs in metro markets leveraging the 45 million connected vehicle installed base expected by 2025 and India's 23% EV adoption target by 2030 positioning Cerebrogrammers as critical infrastructure for the autonomous vehicle era where predictive maintenance becomes a competitive differentiator and revenue stream through data monetization partnerships with insurance providers and aftermarket service networks.Claude is AI and can make mistakes. Grabky Technologies Private Limited is a technology-driven startup focused on building smart, scalable, and user-centric digital solutions for the service industry, with a strong initial focus on the salon and personal care ecosystem.

The core idea behind Grabky is to digitize and simplify appointment management for salons, spas, and service-based businesses while enhancing customer convenience. Grabky is developing a smart salon appointment booking platform that enables users to book services based on real-time availability, service duration, seat/chair allocation, and staff scheduling. Unlike traditional booking systems, Grabky emphasizes intelligent time-slot management, ensuring minimal waiting time and optimal utilization of resources for merchants.

For salon owners and merchants, Grabky provides a merchant dashboard to manage bookings, services, pricing, staff, peak hours, and customer data efficiently. The platform also supports business analytics, revenue tracking, and customer engagement tools, helping small and medium businesses grow digitally without complex technical knowledge.

From a customer perspective, Grabky offers a seamless booking experience, transparent pricing, service-wise duration clarity, and easy rescheduling or cancellation. The long-term vision is to expand Grabky into a multi-service local commerce platform, covering beauty, wellness, and other appointment-based services.

Grabky Technologies aims to empower local businesses, reduce operational friction, and create a technology bridge between service providers and consumers, driving digital adoption and sustainable growth.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Dr. Hari Singh Gour Vishwavidyalaya Sagar University
leader.aboutStartup:
The Problem: Traditional attendance is slow, prone to proxy (cheating), and heavily dependent on stable internet, leading to data manipulation and administrative overhead.

The Solution: We are building an Enterprise-Grade Smart Attendance Ecosystem that eliminates proxies and ensures 100% data integrity using a multi-layered verification approach:

AI-Driven Identity: We utilize Google ML Kit for on-device 3D Liveness Detection (Blink/Smile tracking) and Face++ Global Search to verify identities in under 1.2 seconds.

Multi-Sensor Fusion: To ensure 100% presence accuracy, we combine Dynamic QR (TOTP), NFC (NTAG213), and Ultrasonic Data-over-Sound (encrypted chirps) for secure, offline check-ins.

Blockchain Integrity: Every record is hashed using SHA-256 and logged onto a Private Blockchain Ledger, making attendance records immutable and audit-ready.

Smart Automation: We integrate Smart Contracts to automate student eligibility reports and scholarship triggers, reducing manual faculty work by 80%.

Impact: Our Zero-Trust & Offline-First architecture is specifically designed for the connectivity challenges of educational institutions in Madhya Pradesh, ensuring security, speed, and student privacy through Edge Computing.

leader.aboutStartup:
Grabily

For millions of students, graduates, and working professionals living away from home, daily food is a persistent problem. Cooking every day is unrealistic, local messes are unorganized and hard to discover, and food delivery apps like Zomato and Swiggy are built for occasional restaurant orders, not everyday meals. These platforms are expensive for daily use, inconsistent in quality, and operationally misaligned with the need for affordable, home-style food on a fixed routine.

At the same time, local mess providers already serve this demand offline, but they lack visibility, structure, subscription management, and digital trust. Everything runs on word of mouth, manual tracking, and informal payments, which creates friction for both users and mess owners.

Our startup solves this gap by organizing local mess food into a subscription-based digital platform. Users can discover nearby messes, compare trial and monthly plans, and subscribe to fixed tiffin packages with predictable pricing and transparent meal tracking. Features like absence marking, pause notifications, and delivery confirmation bring reliability to daily food consumption. Mess owners get tools to manage subscribers, track deliveries, and earn stable recurring income without relying on third-party delivery logistics.

Unlike Zomato or Swiggy, we do not compete on convenience food or impulse ordering. We focus on daily necessity, not discretionary spending. By avoiding platform-managed delivery and working directly with mess providers, the system stays cost-efficient, scalable, and sustainable.

The market opportunity is large and underexplored. Urban India has millions of students and professionals dependent on daily mess food, yet no dominant digital platform serves this segment effectively. With high retention, subscription-driven revenue, and locality-based scaling, this model is built for long-term adoption rather than short-term growth hacks.

In essence, we are transforming an unorganized offline necessity into a reliable, structured, and scalable digital service for everyday meals.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Oriental institute of science and technology bhopal
leader.aboutStartup:
Ecosphere – Smart Resource Monitoring System

Ecosphere is a smart resource monitoring system designed to reduce electricity and water wastage while controlling misuse and theft. It addresses real-world issues such as uncontrolled consumption, electricity theft, and uneven water availability.

The system monitors electricity and water usage in real time using affordable sensors and provides clear, data-based insights to users and authorities. It helps households reduce bills and supports governments in minimizing resource loss.

Core Functionality

Real-time monitoring of electricity and water consumption

Detection of abnormal usage patterns and possible misuse

Simple system notifications for high usage, unusual patterns, or maintenance alerts

Monthly usage reports and saving suggestions

Live dashboard to visualize consumption data

Algorithm-based pattern analysis for wastage and tampering detection


Technology Stack

Ecosphere combines Hardware, IoT, Software, Algorithms, and Data Analytics.

Electricity Monitoring:
Uses the SAC-013 current sensor, a clip-type sensor installed near the meter. It measures current flow and detects anomalies using fixed thresholds and historical comparison algorithms.

Water Monitoring:
Uses the YF-S201 flow sensor, which records water flow through a turbine mechanism. Data is processed using rule-based calculations and trend analysis.

Algorithm-Based Analysis:
The system compares current usage with past records. If deviation crosses predefined limits for a sustained period, it triggers alerts. Cross-verification between water and electricity data helps reduce false flags.


Security & Reliability

No personal or sensitive data is stored

User credentials are encrypted

Usage data has no value outside the system

Physical tampering is detected through sudden or irregular pattern changes

Offline data storage with automatic syncing when internet connectivity is restored


Scalability & Impact

Government authorities can analyze region-wise consumption data

Industries can use a premium version with multiple sensors per machine

Suitable for large-scale deployment due to lightweight data processing


Cost & Accessibility

Sensors are affordable and available under ₹1000

Free basic version for home users (ad-supported)

Premium plans for industries and government usage

Low setup cost with long-term savings on bills


Vision

Ecosphere is a practical and scalable monitoring solution focused on responsible electricity and water usage. With simple notifications and algorithm-driven analysis, it supports a more efficient and sustainable future.

MindCare is a thoughtful mental wellness companion app created especially for students navigating the challenges of academic life, daily stress, and emotional fluctuations. It serves as a private, always-available space where young people can find immediate support, track their emotions, and build healthy habits without any judgment or stigma.
At the core of MindCare is an intelligent voice and chat AI bot that acts like a caring, understanding friend. Students can simply type or speak naturally about what they're feeling—whether it's exam anxiety, loneliness, low motivation, or just needing someone to listen—and the bot responds with empathy, gentle guidance, and practical suggestions to help them feel better in the moment.
The app also includes a simple mood tracker that lets users quickly check in with their emotions each day, choosing from feelings like happy, stressed, anxious, calm, or tired. Over time, it reveals personal mood patterns and offers soft insights, such as noticing that mood improves after journaling or listening to music, helping students become more aware of what affects their mental state.
For deeper reflection, MindCare provides a secure private journal where users can freely write about their thoughts, worries, or moments of gratitude. Guided prompts are available for days when it's hard to start writing, and all entries are safely stored so users can revisit their journal history to see their personal growth and progress.
To help with instant calm, the app offers guided breathing exercises and short relaxation sessions perfect for managing sudden stress or preparing for sleep. There's also a collection of soothing music and nature sounds, including lo-fi beats, focus tracks, and sleep playlists, allowing students to unwind or concentrate while studying.
Additional helpful features include quick self-assessment tools to gauge current stress levels, a dedicated help section with emergency contacts, coping tips, and positive affirmations, making it easy to find the right support at the right time.
With its calming green design and intuitive layout, MindCare feels welcoming and peaceful from the moment it's opened. It’s more than just an app—it's a daily companion that quietly supports students in taking care of their mental health, one conversation, one breath, one journal entry at a time, empowering them to face their student journey with greater balance, confidence, and emotional strength. 🧠💚

leader.instituteOrOrg: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal
leader.aboutStartup:
Our startup idea, IRIS 2.0 (Intelligent Retinal Interpretation System), is an AI-powered multimodal assistive healthcare and navigation solution designed to empower visually impaired, deaf-blind, and speech-impaired individuals. The core vision of IRIS 2.0 is to enable independent living, safety, and confidence by bridging the gap between humans and their surroundings using AI, computer vision, and IoT-enabled wearables .
IRIS 2.0 addresses critical real-world challenges such as navigation barriers, obstacle detection, emergency awareness, signboard reading, face recognition, and communication difficulties, which are commonly faced by visually impaired individuals. Unlike existing solutions that are either expensive or fully cloud-dependent, IRIS 2.0 introduces a hybrid intelligence architecture that works seamlessly in both online (cloud-assisted) and offline (edge-based) modes. This ensures real-time responses even in poor or no-network conditions, making it highly suitable for India’s rural and semi-urban environments.
The system integrates vision-based AI for object and obstacle detection, OCR for reading text and signboards, gesture and sign-language recognition, face detection and recognition, GPS-based navigation with voice and haptic feedback, and fall detection with SOS alerts. These features are delivered through a low-cost, multipurpose wearable device powered by on-device AI models and supported by cloud intelligence for enhanced capabilities like data backup and advanced analytics.

What makes IRIS 2.0 unique is its strong focus on affordability, inclusivity, and reliability. While global assistive devices cost several lakhs and rely heavily on internet connectivity, IRIS 2.0 is designed to be priced around ₹25,000–₹30,000, with optional subscription-based premium features, making it accessible to a much larger population through direct sales, NGO partnerships, CSR programs, and government initiatives. 
In essence, IRIS 2.0 is not just a product but a social-impact driven startup idea that combines AI innovation with inclusive design, aiming to transform assistive healthcare technology and significantly improve the quality of life for millions of people.

leader.aboutStartup: Our Idea is KrishiSaathi Which is a farmer-friendly digital platform designed to help Indian farmers make better daily decisions with ease. Many farmers still struggle to get clear information about mandi prices, fast-changing weather, crop care, and government schemes. KrishiSaathi brings all of this together in one simple place. Farmers can check real-time mandi price trends, receive weather alerts, and get easy-to-understand crop advisory guidance based on their crop and region. The platform also helps farmers discover useful government schemes without confusion. The design is clean, mobile-first, and uses simple Hindi + English so even first-time smartphone users can navigate comfortably. Our goal is to reduce risk, increase income, and support farmers with trustworthy information. so KrishiSaathi truly becomes हर किसान का डिजिटल साथी.

leader.aboutStartup: Renewable Energy Private Limited

AQUATIC Nature Private Limited is dedicated to promoting sustainable rural and ecological development in India. The organisation fosters innovation among students through the Atulya Gram–Prakriti Student Competition, encouraging them to propose creative ideas related to the environment, wildlife, aquatic ecosystems, agriculture, eco-tourism, and rural livelihoods, thereby enhancing the spirit of Incredible India through education and innovation.
A weather- and investment-aware crop planning platform to help farmers reduce risk and improve profitability

KalaConnect is an AI-powered digital platform designed to help Madhya Pradesh’s artisans, ODOP producers, and micro-entrepreneurs grow beyond local markets.

Many skilled artisans struggle not with product quality, but with pricing, branding, digital presence, scheme awareness, and market access. KalaConnect solves this by acting as a digital growth assistant rather than just a marketplace.

The platform enables artisans to:

Generate professional product descriptions and branding content using AI

Get smart pricing and packaging suggestions tailored for local and export markets

Discover relevant Madhya Pradesh government schemes and subsidies they are eligible for

Assess their product’s export readiness through a simple AI checklist

Create a shareable digital product profile that can be used for exhibitions, buyers, and government pilots

KalaConnect empowers artisans to become market-ready, discoverable, and scalable, while supporting the Government of Madhya Pradesh’s vision of strengthening ODOP, MSMEs, and rural livelihoods through technology.

The solution is lightweight, easy to use, and pilot-ready for real deployment in partnership with government departments and incubators.

SevaHUB is a video-first business discovery platform designed exclusively for businesses, professionals, startups, and entrepreneurs. Unlike social or entertainment apps, SevaHUB allows businesses to present their offerings through a single authentic video that builds trust and helps customers make informed decisions. With promotions starting at just ₹51, it makes digital visibility affordable for MSMEs and local businesses. Its reward-based engagement model to offering Shagun, cashback, discounts, and offers to ensure genuine viewer attention and real interest. Features like targeted discovery, analytics, cross-platform promotion, SevaHUB AdSense, and V-One SMART QR support sustainable growth and offline-to-online conversion.

EpiAlert, developed by Sunitiq, is an AI-powered epidemic prediction and alert platform designed to help cities detect and prevent disease outbreaks early. It leverages real-time weather data, historical health trends, and machine learning models to predict risks of diseases such as COVID-19, dengue, malaria, and influenza at city and district levels. By integrating epidemic spread simulation, intelligent risk mapping, and timely alerts, EpiAlert enables citizens and health authorities to take proactive, data-driven actions and minimize outbreak impact.

VegFleet is a B2B digital platform designed to streamline fresh vegetable procurement for hotels, restaurants, and cloud kitchens. It allows professional kitchens to browse available produce, place daily or scheduled orders, and receive timely deliveries through an organized system. Vegetables are sourced directly from local farmers and verified warehouses, reducing middlemen and ensuring better freshness, consistent quality, and fair pricing. By digitizing an otherwise unorganized supply chain, VegFleet improves operational efficiency for restaurants while supporting farmers, minimizing food wastage, and strengthening the local agricultural ecosystem

'NIRYAT AARAMBH' is an export enablement Initiative designed to convert ODOP-based farmers, artisans, and small manufacturers of Madhya Pradesh into "First-time Exporters" by addressing the two most critical barriers to entering international trade —  The risk of losing fees spent on export training and lack of access to the first international buyer.
The foundation of NIRYAT AARAMBH is a risk-free, escrow-based fee structure for producers, where facilitation charges are securely held and released only upon completion of defined first-export milestones. This ensures that producers do not lose their fees if the first export does not materialise. Alongside this, NIRYAT AARAMBH takes responsibility for identifying and engaging the first international buyer, supported by end-to-end assistance in export documentation, certification facilitation, and process coordination required to complete the initial export transaction.

Operating as a service-led export enabler and not as a trader, NIRYAT AARAMBH aligns with the One District One Product (ODOP) framework and aims to expand Madhya Pradesh’s grassroots participation in global trade through a structured and confident- first export experience.

Siyaas ek bootstrapped, women-led homegrown brand hai jo handcrafted candles, room fragrances aur car perfumes jaise premium lifestyle fragrance products ka local manufacturing karta hai.
Brand ka focus sustainability, thoughtful design innovation aur affordable luxury par hai, jisse everyday spaces ko aesthetically pleasing aur refreshing banaya ja sake.
Siyaas ne apni journey offline, small-batch manufacturing se shuru ki hai aur ab digital platforms ke through scalable growth par kaam kar raha hai, jisse local craftsmanship ko wider market tak pahunchaya ja sake.

Every year, farmers burn crop stubble because they have very little time and no practical alternative. This causes heavy air pollution, loss of soil nutrients, and long-term damage to farmland.

Agro-Cycle offers a simple on-field solution. It uses a tractor-mounted machine that crushes crop residue, mixes it into the soil, and applies beneficial microbes in one single pass. When water is added, these microbes break down the residue naturally and turn it into organic matter.

Instead of burning waste, Agro-Cycle helps farmers convert stubble into soil nutrition, reduce fertilizer use, save time, and protect the environment. The idea is affordable, farmer-friendly, and designed especially for small and medium farmers.

TaskAI
AI That Owns Work. Not Just Assists It.
TaskAI is a next-generation AI automation platform that builds task-owning AI agents for businesses that want speed, scale, and predictable outcomes. We help companies eliminate manual work, reduce dependency on human bandwidth, and turn operations into a competitive advantage.

We don’t sell AI tools.
We deploy AI operators.


---

The Problem

Businesses today are overloaded with:

Repetitive operational tasks

High manpower costs

Delayed follow-ups and execution gaps

Tool overload with zero accountability


AI exists—but it’s fragmented, underutilized, and rarely delivers ROI.


---

The TaskAI Solution

TaskAI creates custom AI agents that take full ownership of defined business tasks, end-to-end.

From trigger → execution → follow-up → reporting.
No micromanagement. No chaos.


---

Our USP — Why TaskAI Wins

Outcome-Based AI Ownership

Most AI platforms automate steps.
TaskAI automates responsibility.

One Agent = One Business Outcome
Sales. Support. Operations. Finance. One owner, clear accountability.

ROI-First Architecture
Every agent is mapped to time saved, cost reduced, or revenue generated.

Seamless Integration
Works with your CRM, WhatsApp, Email, Google Workspace, ERP—no disruption.

Human-in-the-Loop Control
AI runs autonomously but escalates when strategic judgment is needed.

MSME-Ready, Enterprise-Capable
Built for Indian MSMEs, engineered to scale globally.



---

What We Automate

Sales & Lead Management Agents

WhatsApp / Email Follow-up Agents

Customer Support Agents

Operations & Process Agents

Reporting & Analytics Agents

Internal Workflow & Admin Agents


If a task can be defined, TaskAI can own it.


---

How It Works

1. Business Task Mapping


2. AI Agent Design & Training


3. System Integration


4. Go-Live + Monitoring


5. Continuous Optimization



Execution-focused. No experimentation tax.


---

The Impact

Faster execution

Lower operating costs

Higher productivity

Predictable scalability

Measurable ROI



---

Bottom Line

TaskAI turns AI from a buzzword into a business asset.
You focus on strategy.
We make sure the work gets done—automatically

Millet-it is a mission-driven health-tech and FMCG startup based in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh, dedicated to revolutionizing the Indian snacking industry. We address the critical gap between "tasty" and "healthy" by offering a curated range of snack solutions engineered with a strict Nutritional Value Proposition (NVP).

In a market dominated by brands that use emotional marketing to mask unhealthy ingredients like palm oil, maida, and excessive sugar, Millet-it stands for total transparency. Our products leverage the power of ancient Indian millets, processed through modern food science to ensure they are naturally high in protein and essential fiber without harmful additives.

We operate primarily through a D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) model, supported by a strong community engagement strategy. We are currently executing a transparent "100-Day Challenge" to achieve ₹1 Crore in sales, demonstrating our commitment to rapid scalability and consumer trust. By modernizing traditional grains, Millet-it is not just selling snacks; we are providing a convenient, sustainable solution for the modern, health-conscious Indian lifestyle while contributing to the "Atmanirbhar Bharat" and "Vocal for Local" initiatives.

About the Global Offensive Security:
Global Offensive Security is a Bhopal-based, MSME-registered cybersecurity firm dedicated to securing the digital infrastructure of India’s underserved MSME sector. While large enterprises have massive security budgets, 90% of local businesses remain "digitally naked" and vulnerable to attacks that could halt state industrial growth.

Our Core Value Proposition:

Localized VAPT Services: We provide enterprise-grade Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing (VAPT) tailored to the budget and operational constraints of Indian small and medium enterprises.

Compliance-as-a-Service: We act as a bridge for businesses to achieve compliance with the Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act 2023, mitigating the risk of massive legal penalties.

Zero-Downtime Audits: Our proprietary framework ensures that manufacturing lines and service operations remain 100% functional during security testing.

The "Ship It" Vision: We have moved beyond the ideation phase and are currently operating as a service provider. Our goal at Hack & Make 2026 is to scale our "Security Operations Center for MSMEs" across the Bhopal-Indore industrial corridor, ensuring that the "Make in MP" mission is built on a foundation of unshakeable cyber-resilience.

Punha Prosthetic is a healthcare deep-tech startup working on a mind-controlled, EMG-based prosthetic arm designed to restore functional independence for upper-limb amputees. The solution uses non-invasive EMG signals, intelligent signal processing, and AI-based intent recognition to translate a user’s muscle activity into smooth, natural hand movements.

Punha focuses on building a user-centric, ergonomic, and affordable prosthetic system, addressing key gaps in existing solutions such as high cost, limited intuitiveness, and low adaptability to Indian users. The startup follows a strong research-to-product approach, combining hardware–software integration, clinical feedback, and iterative prototyping.

The long-term vision of Punha is to bridge the gap between advanced prosthetic research and real-world accessibility, enabling amputees to regain confidence, dignity, and quality of life, while creating a scalable assistive technology solution for emerging markets.

Rages India Revolution Pvt. Ltd. is a deep-tech startup developing AI-powered drone solutions for surveillance, industrial cleaning, and agriculture. Our mission is to replace unsafe, manual, and inefficient operations with intelligent, autonomous aerial systems that improve safety, efficiency, and decision-making. We design mission-specific, modular drones integrated with onboard AI, secure communication, and long-endurance capabilities for real-world deployment. Our solutions support 24/7 monitoring, high-risk cleaning operations, and precision farming, addressing critical needs across infrastructure, public safety, and agriculture. With a strong focus on Make-in-India innovation and scalable deployment, we aim to deliver reliable, indigenous drone technologies for government and enterprise applications.

AK Farming is an agritech startup developing India’s first fully mechanical and affordable automatic flood irrigation system for farmers. Our core product, the “Timer Valve”, is a mechanical timer-based 3-way valve that automatically diverts water between farm plots without using electricity, batteries, or electronics. It is specifically designed for traditional flood irrigation, enabling farmers to irrigate their fields automatically without the need to visit farms at night or during harsh weather conditions. The solution significantly reduces labour dependency, saves water, and improves irrigation efficiency while remaining cost-effective and suitable for rural farming conditions. The Timer Valve has been successfully field-tested with farmers and is currently being upgraded for bulk manufacturing and extended application in micro-irrigation systems.

We provide a V2X-Guided Swarm Intelligence Stack that converts existing Level-2 or non-autonomous "drive-by-wire" vehicles into fully autonomous agents.
​Precision Navigation: We use RTK-GNSS (centimeter-level accuracy) via India’s CORS network to map precise round-trip routes, eliminating the need for expensive LiDAR mappers and extra sensors.

​Swarm Networking: Our proprietary "Swarmdrive" stack allows vehicles to talk to each other (V2V) and the infrastructure (V2I). Instead of "guessing" what other vehicles will do via sensors, our vehicles resolve conflicts as a "Council" in real-time.

​Compute Efficiency: By using "Positional Vectors" to inform vehicles of their surroundings, we reduce the onboard ADAS processing load by 70%.

​Retrofit Capability: Our edge computers can be retrofitted onto existing trucks, and even non-upgraded vehicles can carry "Passive Nodes" to participate in the safety network.

This project presents a compact, low-cost, and modular home automation system designed to improve everyday convenience, safety, and energy efficiency. Unlike conventional smart-home solutions that require modern or digitally enabled appliances, this system is appliance-independent—any electrical device, even decades-old appliances, can be automated as long as it operates using a standard electrical switch. This makes the system highly practical for real homes, especially where replacing existing appliances is not feasible.

The system provides wireless control and automation through a centralized controller while maintaining simple installation, low maintenance, and small physical size. It is designed to consume minimal power and includes a power saver feature, which automatically turns off user-selected, non-essential appliances after a predefined time interval (currently set to 5 seconds). This helps prevent unnecessary power consumption, reduces electricity bills, and improves overall energy efficiency.

For safety, an emergency shutdown mechanism is incorporated, allowing all connected appliances to be switched off instantly during abnormal or hazardous conditions. The system architecture is modular and scalable, enabling easy expansion without major hardware or software changes.

By focusing on local control, optimized hardware usage, and practical engineering design, the system remains cost-effective, reliable, and suitable for widespread adoption. This project serves as a strong foundation for future enhancements such as advanced sensing, intelligent decision-making, and research-oriented development in smart automation systems.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science, Gwalior, Deemed University
leader.aboutStartup:
The increasing use of solar energy has made performance monitoring and efficiency optimization a critical requirement for both small and large solar installations. However, many solar power systems operate without continuous monitoring, making it difficult to identify performance losses caused by factors such as dust accumulation, shading, panel aging, temperature rise, inverter faults, or fluctuating weather conditions. In the absence of real-time data, users are often unaware of reduced efficiency, leading to energy losses, delayed maintenance, and lower financial returns.

The IoT-Based Solar Power Monitoring System is designed to provide complete real-time visibility of solar power generation and system health. The system continuously measures key electrical and environmental parameters including solar panel voltage, current, power output, total energy generation, panel temperature, and solar irradiance. By capturing these parameters in real time, the system enables accurate assessment of panel performance and overall system efficiency under varying environmental conditions.

The system uses IoT-enabled sensors and smart measurement units installed at the solar panels and inverter level. Voltage and current sensors measure electrical output, while irradiance sensors track the amount of sunlight falling on the panels. Temperature sensors monitor panel heating, which directly affects efficiency. All collected data is transmitted to a cloud-based platform, where it is processed and displayed through an easy-to-understand web or mobile dashboard. Users can view live generation data, daily and monthly energy reports, and performance trends without requiring technical expertise.

One of the core strengths of the system is its intelligent fault detection and alert mechanism. The system continuously compares real-time values of voltage, current, power, and irradiance with expected performance levels. Any abnormal behavior, such as sudden drops in power output despite high irradiance, unusual voltage or current fluctuations, inverter malfunction, or excessive temperature rise, is immediately detected. The user is notified in real time, allowing quick corrective action and reducing system downtime.

Beyond monitoring, the system supports performance optimization and preventive maintenance. By analyzing historical data, the system helps identify underperforming panels, dust-related losses, seasonal efficiency variations, and long-term degradation trends. This enables informed maintenance scheduling, optimized cleaning cycles, and better planning for system upgrades. The system is designed to be scalable and can be implemented in residential rooftops, commercial buildings, institutions, and large solar plants.

The technology behind the IoT-Based Solar Power Monitoring System includes IoT sensors, real-time data acquisition modules, cloud-based analytics, and a secure monitoring interface. The architecture is cost-effective, reliable, and suitable for Indian climatic and operating conditions. Future enhancements include AI-based power prediction using irradiance data, weather-integrated energy forecasting, automated fault diagnosis, and integration with smart grids and energy management systems.

The vision of this system is to make solar power generation transparent, efficient, and reliable. By providing real-time insights into voltage, current, irradiance, temperature, power, and energy generation, the system empowers users to maximize solar output, reduce operational losses, and contribute effectively to a sustainable and clean energy ecosystem.

AI Roadside Pollution-Eating Robot (CarbonX Bot)
🌍 Problem Statement
Urban roadside air pollution caused by vehicles leads to high levels of PM2.5, PM10, CO, and carbon particles, resulting in serious health issues.
Current solutions only monitor pollution but do not actively reduce it.
💡 Proposed Solution
CarbonX Bot is an AI-enabled autonomous ground robot that:
Moves along polluted roadside areas
Sucks in polluted air
Traps carbon particles using electrostatic filtration
Collects carbon residue and converts it into reusable ink / construction material
Uses AI to operate only in high-pollution zones
⚙️ Working Principle (Simple Explanation)
1️⃣ Air Intake System
High-speed DC fan pulls polluted air into the robot.
2️⃣ Electrostatic Precipitator (ESP)
Charged plates attract carbon & dust particles
Clean air exits back into environment
3️⃣ Carbon Collection Chamber
Collected carbon settles in a removable tray
4️⃣ Carbon Utilization Module
Carbon mixed with binder → ink / brick prototype
5️⃣ AI Decision System
Robot moves to areas where pollution is highest
Uses sensor + AI logic
🧠 Role of AI & ML (IMPORTANT FOR JUDGES)
AI identifies pollution hotspots
ML predicts peak pollution time
Robot auto-adjusts:
Fan speed
Operation time
Route path
🛠 Hardware Components (Prototype Level)
Component
Purpose
ESP32 / Raspberry Pi
Main controller
PM2.5 Sensor
Pollution detection
High-speed DC fan
Air suction
Electrostatic plates
Particle trapping
Activated carbon filter
Gas absorption
Motor + wheels
Mobility
Battery + Solar panel
Power
💻 Software & Tools
Python / Arduino IDE
OpenCV (optional)
AI logic (threshold + learning)
IoT dashboard (optional)
🌱 Innovation Highlights (WHY IT WINS)
✔ Pollution reduction, not just monitoring
✔ Converts pollution into useful products
✔ Circular economy concept
✔ Smart city + environment + AI combined
🌆 Real-World Use Cases
Roadsides
Traffic junctions
Construction areas
School & hospital zones

leader.instituteOrOrg: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science Gwalior, Deemed University
leader.aboutStartup:
SAOS – Smart Agriculture Optimization System
SAOS (Smart Agriculture Optimization System) is an innovative agri-technology solution designed to modernize traditional farming through data-driven intelligence and smart decision-making. Agriculture today faces multiple challenges such as unpredictable climate conditions, inefficient water usage, increasing input costs, and limited access to real-time information. Most farmers still depend on experience-based farming practices, which often lead to excessive resource usage, crop stress, and reduced profitability. SAOS aims to solve these challenges by introducing a smart, reliable, and technology-driven system that enables farmers to take informed decisions at the right time.
The system works by continuously monitoring key environmental parameters such as soil moisture, temperature, humidity, and overall field conditions using sensors and data analytics. Based on this real-time data, SAOS provides intelligent recommendations for irrigation scheduling, crop health management, and resource optimization. This ensures that crops receive only the required amount of water and care, preventing both overuse and underuse of resources. As a result, farmers can achieve better yield with reduced operational costs.
SAOS also includes a smart decision-support mechanism that analyzes historical and real-time data to detect abnormal patterns in crop growth and environmental conditions. It helps farmers identify early signs of crop stress and take preventive actions before major damage occurs. The system presents all insights through a simple and user-friendly dashboard, making it accessible even for farmers with limited technical knowledge. The platform is designed to be scalable, allowing it to be used by small farmers as well as large agricultural enterprises.
The technology behind SAOS combines IoT-based sensing, data analytics, and rule-based intelligence, with future scope for machine learning-based prediction models. It operates on a cloud-based infrastructure and can be accessed through a mobile or web interface, making monitoring and decision-making convenient and efficient. The system is specifically designed keeping Indian agricultural conditions in mind, ensuring affordability, reliability, and adaptability.
One of the key strengths of SAOS is its focus on optimization rather than just monitoring. It not only collects data but converts it into meaningful insights that help reduce water consumption, lower input costs, and increase overall productivity. By promoting efficient resource utilization, SAOS contributes to sustainable farming practices while improving farmers’ income and reducing the risk of crop failure.
In the long term, SAOS aims to integrate advanced features such as AI-based crop disease detection, weather-based forecasting, automated irrigation control, and multilingual mobile applications. It also holds potential for integration with government agricultural schemes and smart farming initiatives. The vision of SAOS is to transform traditional agriculture into a smart, sustainable, and profitable ecosystem by empowering farmers with technology-driven solutions.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Indore institute of science and technology
leader.aboutStartup:
This project focuses on developing a low-cost, ESP32-based drone with fully handwritten firmware. The drone is designed to be simple, customizable, and affordable compared to commercially available drones.
It can be controlled either through a conventional remote or via a mobile application/web interface using the ESP32’s built-in Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, eliminating the need for expensive additional hardware.
The objective of this project is to create the cheapest possible customizable drone for learning, experimentation, and future feature expansion.

leader.aboutStartup:
Bharattapp is a digital identity and engagement platform designed to simplify how individuals, businesses, and institutions share verified contact and profile information. Using NFC and QR-based technology, Bharattapp enables instant, paperless sharing of details through a simple tap or scan, without requiring any mobile application.

The platform goes beyond traditional visiting cards by offering centralized profile management, allowing information to be updated in real time without reprinting. This makes it especially useful for organizations, government offices, and Smart City initiatives where accuracy, continuity, and sustainability are critical.

Bharattapp supports eco-friendly practices, reduces operational costs, and improves professional communication by providing secure, customizable digital profiles aligned with Digital India goals. With easy deployment and scalable infrastructure, the solution is suitable for startups, enterprises, and public institutions seeking a modern, efficient alternative to printed business cards.

The Bold Option: "X-ray vision for smarter, safer cities."
The Technical Option: "AI-driven drone intelligence for surface and subsurface urban monitoring."
The Impact Option: "Eliminating urban blind spots—above and below the ground."

DroneKaksha Labs is building Madhya Pradesh's first Unified Drone Training Ecosystem. Our custom ESP32-based hardware architecture creates a seamless learning path from School Students (Class 9) to Engineering Grads & Hobbyists. While our curriculum is aligned with the PSSIVE Bhopal Vocational Syllabus for government compliance, our affordable modular kits (₹2,500) are equally designed for Private Schools, STEM Clubs, and Individual Makers. We are democratizing drone technology—making it accessible for a village school, a premium private college, and a garage hobbyist alike.

Pragyanik AI is an agri-tech startup focused on building affordable, AI-driven precision farming solutions for Indian farmers. The startup develops integrated hardware and software systems using AI, IoT, and GNSS to automate and optimize key farm operations. Its solutions address real on-ground challenges such as uneven land leveling, water wastage, high labour dependency, and low operational efficiency. Designed specifically for Indian farm sizes and conditions, Pragyanik AI’s technologies enable autonomous land leveling, precision guidance, smart irrigation, and multipurpose farm operations. The idea is to bring intelligence directly onto the field, making advanced farming technology practical, scalable, and accessible to small and marginal farmers.

Introducing Health 360: A health monitoring device that focuses on delivering painless, non-invasive, and affordable healthcare solution. It enables real-time tracking of glucose and key vitals using sensors and intelligent analytics, reducing dependence on consumables and clinic visits.
Designed for scalability and mass adoption, Health 360 targets preventive care across home, rural, and primary healthcare ecosystems.

leader.aboutStartup: Its a farm Solar insect light trap is a solar-powered device used for monitoring and controlling insect pests. It attracts insects using light during night hours and traps them without using chemicals. It is economical, eco-friendly and suitable for sustainable agriculture.
Seiso is a waste segregation startup

Our aims to develop and commercialize a smart, wearable posture correction device focused on monitoring neck posture in real time. The device detects prolonged improper posture during screen usage and provides vibration-based alerts to help users correct their posture, reducing the risk of neck and spine-related health problems among working professionals and children.

This idea focuses on detecting leakage current in electric poles to prevent accidents and power loss. Sometimes due to damaged insulation, rainwater, or faulty wiring, current leaks into the pole, making it dangerous for humans and animals.

In this system, a current sensor is installed on the electric pole to continuously monitor the flow of electricity. If any abnormal or leakage current is detected, the system immediately identifies it and sends an alert to the electricity department through a communication module.

This helps authorities take quick action, reduces the risk of electric shock accidents, improves public safety, and ensures better maintenance of power infrastructure.

leader.aboutStartup:
Mlock is a smart luggage storage solution designed for public spaces such as railway stations, bus terminals, temples, tourist zones, and event areas. It addresses the common problem of travelers carrying luggage while exploring cities or waiting between check-in and departure times.

Mlock provides secure, tech-enabled smart lockers that allow users to safely store their bags for flexible durations. The system integrates hardware lockers with a digital platform for easy check-in and check-out, real-time availability, and transparent usage tracking.

Our solution helps municipal corporations, transport authorities, and event organizers improve visitor convenience, reduce crowding, and enhance overall urban mobility. Mlock aligns with Smart City initiatives by offering a scalable, revenue-generating, and user-friendly public infrastructure solution.

leader.instituteOrOrg: Oriental institute of science and technology Bhopal
leader.aboutStartup:
Our Idea is focused on building an inclusive communication ecosystem for the Deaf and Speech-Impaired community. We are developing Smart Sign Language Gloves, a wearable IoT-based solution that translates sign language gestures into real-time text and speech, enabling seamless communication with people who do not understand sign language.
The goal is simple but powerful: remove communication barriers and make conversations accessible, natural, and instant.
The Problem We Are Solving
Millions of people who rely on sign language face daily challenges while communicating with the general population.
Existing solutions such as human interpreters or camera-based systems are:
Expensive
Not available 24/7
Dependent on lighting, camera position, or internet quality
There is a strong need for a portable, reliable, and always-available solution.
Our Solution
We introduce a sensor-based smart glove that captures hand gestures directly from the user’s hand, ensuring high accuracy and privacy.
The glove:
Detects finger bending, hand orientation, and motion
Converts sign language gestures into text and voice output
Works wirelessly with a mobile app and web platform
Supports two-way communication (sign → text/speech and voice → text/sign)
How It Works (Technical Overview)
Flex Sensors are placed on each finger to measure bending angles
MPU-6050 (Accelerometer + Gyroscope) tracks hand orientation and motion
ESP32 Microcontroller processes sensor data and handles Bluetooth/Wi-Fi communication
A machine learning model recognizes gesture patterns
Output is displayed as text or converted to speech on a mobile app or website
An additional emergency feature allows the user to trigger an SOS message with location and contact details using a pressure sensor.
Key Features
 Real-time sign language to text & speech conversion
Lightweight, wearable, and user-friendly design
 Sensor-based approach (works without cameras)
Wireless connectivity with Android app & website
 Emergency alert system for safety
Designed for scalability and AI-driven improvements
No dependency on camera placement or background
Impact & Vision
Our vision is to create a world where communication is not limited by physical ability.
This solution can be used in:
Daily conversations
Educational institutions
Hospitals and emergency services
Public offices and workplaces
We aim to scale this into a complete assistive communication platform, empowering the Deaf and Mute community with independence, confidence, and equal opportunities.
Current Status
Working prototype developed
Sensor data collection & model training in progress
Mobile app and web interface under development

leader.aboutStartup:
Remote Rehabilitation Platform Using Connected Therapeutic Devices

We are building an IoT-enabled remote rehabilitation platform that allows licensed physiotherapists to deliver, monitor, and continuously optimize clinical electrotherapy treatments remotely—bringing high-quality, protocol-driven physiotherapy care to patients in underserved and hard-to-reach regions.

At its core, the platform functions as a full-fledged clinical management system (CMS), integrated with a Clinical Decision Support System (CDSS) to ensure evidence-based, safe, and consistent rehabilitation delivery at scale.

The Problem

Access to qualified physiotherapy remains severely limited in rural and semi-urban areas. Patients with post-operative needs, neurological conditions, musculoskeletal injuries, or chronic pain often:

Lack access to trained physiotherapists

Discontinue therapy due to travel and cost constraints

Receive unregulated or incorrectly administered treatment

Experience delayed recovery, chronic pain, or long-term disability

Conventional physiotherapy is location-dependent, clinician-intensive, and difficult to scale, especially in regions with low provider density and fragmented follow-up care.

The Solution

Our platform enables clinically supervised, device-driven rehabilitation at home, supported by a centralized CMS and an intelligent CDSS layer.

We combine connected therapeutic hardware with a secure, clinician-first software platform that allows qualified physiotherapists to remotely prescribe, control, and monitor treatments such as:

TENS (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation)

Muscle Stimulation

IFT (Interferential Therapy)

Other electrotherapy and rehabilitation protocols

Patients receive therapy at home using our devices, while physiotherapists retain full clinical authority and visibility, ensuring safety, compliance, and therapeutic effectiveness.

How It Works
IoT-Enabled Devices

Smart electrotherapy devices capable of receiving real-time treatment parameters and enforcing clinician-defined safety thresholds.

Clinical Management System (CMS)

A centralized system to manage:

Patient profiles and rehabilitation cases

Diagnosis, goals, and treatment plans

Session history, progress tracking, and adherence

Device allocation and therapy timelines

Clinical Decision Support System (CDSS)

An intelligent decision-support layer that:

Assists physiotherapists with protocol recommendations based on condition, progress, and clinical guidelines

Flags deviations, risks, or non-compliance

Supports evidence-based decision-making without removing clinician control

Clinician Dashboard

Physiotherapists can:

Configure therapy protocols

Adjust intensity, duration, and frequency

Monitor patient progress and outcomes remotely

Patient Interface

A simple, guided experience designed for:

Low-tech environments

Elderly and mobility-restricted patients

Clear session guidance and compliance support

Real-Time Monitoring & Oversight

Session logs, device usage, and safety events are tracked continuously

No autonomous therapy—all treatments remain under professional supervision

Why This Matters

Extends the reach of qualified physiotherapists without compromising clinical standards

Reduces travel burden, costs, and therapy dropout rates

Enables continuity of care beyond hospitals and urban clinics

Improves outcomes through consistent, protocol-driven rehabilitation

Scales physiotherapy access using clinician-led, technology-enabled care

Who It Serves

Patients in rural and semi-urban regions

Post-operative and chronic rehabilitation patients

Elderly and mobility-restricted individuals

Hospitals and clinics extending care beyond physical facilities

The Advantage

Unlike generic home-use therapy devices, our platform is clinician-controlled, CMS-driven, and CDSS-assisted.

We are not replacing physiotherapists.
We are amplifying their clinical reach, standardizing care delivery, and enabling safe, data-driven rehabilitation at scale—while remaining regulation-ready and clinically compliant.

Vision

To become the infrastructure layer for remote physical rehabilitation, combining connected devices, clinical workflows, and decision support, enabling millions of patients to receive safe, effective, and supervised physiotherapy—regardless of geography.
